QuestData.Title: The Platinum Discs
QuestData.Description: Touching the Discs of Norgannon once again makes your hand tingle. This time, however, a strange grinding noise is heard from inside the discs.$B$BYour backpack suddenly becomes heavier than it was before. Inside, you discover a miniature version of the discs!$B$BNo doubt, an item of this sort would be invaluable for someone interested in the ancient history of Azeroth. Someone would sure be interested in this!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the miniature version of the Discs of Norgannon to someone very interested in them.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is that you have there? What did you learn from the discs?
QuestData.RewardText: These discs will change everything. Their secrets are ours now.
